alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:26AM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations mostly between 3 and 5 inches, but up to 7 inches possible in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera and Eastern Toole and Liberty. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty
